Game: 1 vs. 100 2008-06-30T00:00:00-07:00 1 vs. 100 puts you in the hot seat as you play against 100 mob members! Answer the questions correctly and eliminate the mob members. If you give the wrong answer, the game is over! 1 vs. 100 for the Nintendo DS recreates the fun of the hit TV show, while 4 additional game modes bring on new and competitive excitement. 1 <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/b869ad5f-8f6c-4d40-87b1-f29b0f3c5c39.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/f5fb7ca0-3d03-433d-85a9-a3d109d1a649.jpg 0 E - Everyone Puzzle ECi DSI Games
